overview: The teenager Samuca (Matheus Costa) is only 17 years old and discovers that his girlfriend, Alicia, (Heslaine Vieira) is pregnant. The news comes to light at a not very favorable moment in Samuca's life, just when he thought everything was going very well. For having committed the same "slam" as his mother Melina (Nanda Costa), having a son at the same age as she had him, Samuca feels pressured. Themes such as teenage pregnancy and questions about life gain visibility and are unfolded throughout the plot.
title: Slam
